text:
@piersmorgan @MattHancock UNITED KINGDOM 
67 MIllion people. 13,729  deaths. 
We have lost 1 in 4880 people.

GERMANY. 
83 Million people 4052 deaths.
They have lost 1 in 20,483

That makes our death rate over 4 times higher. True facts.

#COVID19 #NHS
